title: CS Practical Competency Strengthening: Blended Learning for Pre-Service Teacher Competency Development via MOOCs

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can implement and evaluate three interaction strategies to enhance teacher presence in MOOC environments.
Learners can form and operate learning communities with peer learners using mobile-based collaboration tools.
Learners can design online discussion frameworks based on social learning theory and analyze application cases.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
